name: Fun With Dynamite
description:
Place dynamite sticks, then use the detonator to detonate them. The object is to knock the bad guy off. The stars are good, if you explode near star, you will lose the level. To earn a coin for a level, try to blast the bad guy away using as few explosions as possible. Challenge yourself and play a series of unique puzzle levels.

Features
- 70 fun levels
- Easy-to-use interface
- Realistic physics and gravity
- Cool soundFX

Have fun with dynamite!
